.. _amdgpu_synid_gfx10_imm16_2:

imm16
=====

A 16-bit :ref:`integer_number<amdgpu_synid_integer_number>` or an :ref:`absolute_expression<amdgpu_synid_absolute_expression>`. The value must be in the range -32768..65535.
